This is a post to test how to embed external Shiny apps in html posts, and whether or not it works.

Below is a shiny app I developed long time ago. Enter names (with the first letter capitalized) and it will create a trend plot at the bottom based on Social Security Data.


<iframe src="https://cengiz-zopluoglu.shinyapps.io/names/" width="1200px !important" height="2000px"></iframe>
